name: DELIR
description:
Game done as a team of two. A simple distress call from the morgue turns into something surreal and you end up fighting for your life. You don't know what's real and what's in your head.

Available in game: Inventory, Crafting system, weapon aiming, camera zoom (unarmed),  Glock, Fire Axe, "Inspect" feature on some items (hints in game), pick-ups, powerfull, homemade self-learning A.I., Ragdolls, advanced HUD, advanced settings (change graphics, key bindings, etc)

Game currently in pre-beta release. Please leave me your feedback, you could be helping shape the game.

You have available a .rar and a .zip archive. Download any of them.

Your donation is much appreciated https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/FlorinPain
